# Top 10 Best Bluetooth Speakers Under 50 in 2020 Reviewed

You want the **best Bluetooth speakers under 50** bucks on the market. So, you
jump online and do a quick search. It seems easy, right?

Wrong!

Millions of results pop up. Not twenty or thirty but MILLIONS. Insane!

You don’t have time for this.

You just want an excellent Bluetooth speaker that has an incredible sound, and
you don’t want to spend a lot of money.

But you also don’t want to waste your money on a piece of junk.

**No worries!**

I’ve done a ton of research for you. And just so you know upfront, you don’t
have to spend a lot of money to get incredible sounding Bluetooth speakers.

My top ten picks are right here.

By the time you’re done reading this post, you’ll know how to choose the
**best Bluetooth speakers under $50.**

And you’ll know how to choose the option that works best for you.

Now let’s dive into the criteria I used to rank the **best Bluetooth speakers
under 50 in 2020.**

## My Criteria for Rating the Best Bluetooth Speakers Under 50

New models of Bluetooth speakers show up almost weekly. The product had to
**fall below the $50 price point** to make my list.

While the **price was a primary factor** in the ranking, I also give you some
essential details about each based on eight categories.

These key factors represent a wide range of options that readers look for in
an inexpensive Bluetooth speaker.

If you’re looking for something easy to use on the go, then portability and
battery life might be most important to you.

Several options are available that work well for home entertainment decor,
too.

So, what are the most relevant points of each key factor?

### Portability (Size and Weight)

Sound quality isn’t sacrificed for weight or dimension. My top choices can be
**easily transported** by hand, in a backpack, or in a suitcase.

### Battery Life

You want something that has a battery life that outlasts your best camping
trip. And, rechargeable batteries help stretch the dollar even further.

**Rechargeable batteries are a must for this type of speaker in my book.**

### Sound Quality

The best performing speakers on my list had **incredible bass** , more
**distortion-free sound** with an **efficient output** , and **excellent
amplification** power.

### Ruggedness and waterproof design – Water Resistance

Superior consideration went to speakers that had an [IPX (Ingress
Protection)](https://maxyourhometime.com/ip-ratings-guide/) rating of IPX5 and
above.

That means your speaker can survive powerful jets of water (IPX6) or immersion
for 30 minutes (IPX7).

It also helped if the speaker had a **durability factor** that could hold up
to your clumsiest life moments.

### Connectivity

The convenience of pairing makes connecting your Bluetooth compatible devices
a breeze.

But the **range is an essential factor** , so my speaker choices needed the
optimal range of at least 66 feet and ample device compatibility.

### Design & Style Options

Special consideration went to speakers that had a **unique design** , with
sleek angles, and multiple color choices.

### Ease of Use

It shouldn’t take an aerospace engineer to figure out how to work a Bluetooth
speaker.

My top picks have **user-friendly functions** that make integrating your
favorite audio devices a snap.

### Special Features

Everyone likes a few **bells and whistles** now and then. You’ll find
everything from voice control, smart home-friendly features to BassUp
Technology on my list.

And extra options such as a carrying case.

My top ten list has some new options for the smartest shopper. Yes, that’s
you!

Before we dive into my top ten list, check out my detailed post **How Do
Bluetooth Speakers Work** if you’re still unsure that Bluetooth speakers are
right for you. Knowing how they work can significantly influence your buying
decision.

Now that you know my rating criteria, here are my top 10 picks for best
Bluetooth speakers under $50 in 2020.

![](https://ir-na.amazon-adsystem.com/e/ir?t=max-

### Simply The Best

This Bluetooth speaker is genuinely the **best Bluetooth speaker under 50**
I’ve found.

### Battery Life Outlasts Your All-Nighter!

Your all-nighter can become a 2-night party extravaganza, and you’ll still
have time for one last dance before this speaker loses its juice.

This baby offers the **most extended playtime with 24 hours of beautiful
bass** and **distortion-free sound**.

### All About That Bass

With Anker’s signature BassUp Technology, smooth, thundering vibrations
tantalize your ears for a splendid listening experience. Soundcore 2 **can’t
be matched** by other Bluetooth speakers – even in higher price ranges.

### No Worry Water Fun

Anker Soundcore 2 has an **IPX7 rating for superior water resistance**.

Pool, beach, rain, mud bowl, you name it, Anker Soundcore 2’s rugged, water-
resistant construction outperforms them all.

### Splurge on the Extras

If you can splurge a little, there is an optional travel case for ultimate
portability.

It would be nice if I didn’t have to purchase the auxiliary cable separately,
like other models on my list.

However, Anker offers a 4ft Cable for a reasonable price. And the cable is
backed by an 18-month warranty, just like the speaker.

### Protection At Its Best

All these incredible features plus an 18-month, hassle-free warranty, make the
Soundcore 2 my favorite choice.

Excellent service can be hard to find. Anker is responsive, courteous, and
stands behind their name.

### Anker Soundcore 2 – What I Like

  * Best speaker for the price point.
  * 24-hour battery life 
  * Amazing bass even at the highest volume settings.
  * Excellent customer service 

### Anker Soundcore 2 – What I Don’t Like

  * It doesn’t come with an auxiliary cable. 
  * Not enough color options. Anker offers black, blue, and red. 

### Anker Soundcore 2 – Who It’s Best For?

You have the perfect sound system, and you need a Bluetooth speaker that can
move with you.

You love your music and want to take it with you wherever you go.

  * Spend time in the kitchen-not a problem.
  * Outside gardening-nothing to it.
  * Your favorite vacation spot-you’re covered there too.

And the best part is if you love to entertain for hours, Soundcore 2 will even
outlast the guest that won’t leave. We’ve all been there, right?

If this describes you, Anker Soundcore 2 is the perfect match.

### Rugged and Waterproof

It wasn’t hard to rank this speaker #2 for the best rugged. And it’s also the
**best waterproof Bluetooth speaker under $50** in my top ten.

### Ultimate Durability

Aomais Sport II is **built for ultimate durability**. A full rubber exterior
protects the well-built guts of this lustrous-looking little machine.

It has an **IPX7 rating.** If you drop it in a bathtub or pool, it can handle
3.3 ft of immersion for up to 30 minutes.

I’m not the most graceful person, so the Aomais Sport II can hold up to my
worst blunders.

### Outstanding Range But Make Sure You Can Recharge

The rechargeable Lithium-battery is a win here with **up to 20 hours of
playtime** and a **99-foot range**.

The downside is if you like max volume, your battery life is cut almost in
half.

But at mid-range volume, you can go the farthest distance and still enjoy your
favorite audio.

### Money-Saving Options

This little powerhouse has all the best options:

  * Hands-free functionality to connect with your cell phone, tablet, PC, and everything in between.
  * Save money because this great little speaker comes with a USB cable and AUX cable.

### Aomais Sport II – What I Like

  * Best waterproof and rugged speaker for the price point.
  * Rubber exterior for an extra layer of protection.
  * AUX and USB cords at no extra cost.

### Aomais Sport II – What I Don’t Like

  * Some distortion at max volume.
  * You only get 20 hours of battery life at mid-range volume.
  * Designed more for the rugged outdoors look, not home decor. 

### Aomais Sport II – Who It’s Best For?

You’re active. You love being outdoors. Your speaker can travel with you to
the beach, camping, and anywhere you like to experience adventure.

You can be a little clumsy, especially when you’re playing hard.

If this is you, this fantastic Bluetooth speaker under 50 bucks is a goldmine!

### Clip and Go

JBL Clip Portable landed the #3 spot not only for the price but because it’s
the **best wearable Bluetooth speaker**.

This tiny little Bluetooth speaker **packs a powerful punch**. And it can clip
onto your clothes.

It’s perfect for the runner who loves listening to their motivating playlist
while beating their last run time.

### Great for Active People but Not for The Partier

JBL Clip 3 Portable isn’t intended to produce a loud, booming volume.

You won’t be hosting a pool party with this one, but the rainy-day run is not
a problem with the carabiner clip and IPX7 waterproof rating.

For the size and price of this type of speaker, it **delivers exceptional
sound quality**.

### Convenient Rechargeable Battery

It’s rechargeable! As you know, this is one of my favorite features of
Bluetooth speakers.

This is especially important for a clip-and-go speaker. You use it daily, so
the convenience of quick charging is terrific.

### JBL Clip 3 Portable – What I Like

  * Nice large carabiner for flexible clip-and-go use.
  * 13 different color choices. 
  * It’s waterproof, and it floats.
  * Affordable and performs like the higher-priced UE Wonderboom 2. 

### JBL Clip 3 Portable – What I Don’t Like

  * If you want to connect this JBL Clip 3 Portable to an older version for dual speaker sound, you can’t. 
  * Issues with holding a charge. Less than 1% of more than 4,000 reviews had this problem. I can live with those odds. 
  * The front cover comes off. These issues are isolated to less than 1% of reviewers.

### JBL Clip 3 – Who It’s Best For?

You need something small that you don’t have to carry. You love to play hard
and workout hard.

You want something small, portable, and easy to tow while you do your thing.

You enjoy water sports, and you don’t want to worry about losing or ruining
your new portable Bluetooth speaker.

You love cool gadgets, and you want lots of color options. You might even
consider buying one to match all your favorite workout clothes.

### Fantastic Sound Quality

Tribit Xsound Go has a fantastic sound quality for the price that’s just over
$30.

Some buyers compared this little speaker to the Anker Soundcore 2 for its
sound performance.

I agree. The bass and clarity for a smaller speaker are as close to the
performance of Soundcore 2 as you can get.

### Fabulous Addition for Your Home Sound System

Tribit is an excellent addition to your home sound system.

The rich, full sound and ability to play it on max volume without distortion
make this portable Bluetooth speaker a great buy.

You can feel the beautiful, smooth bass when you hold the speaker.

Tribit’s fine-tuning of the volume leveling is noticeable with minimal
vibration transference in your hand.

### See for Yourself the Sound Difference

For a live demonstration to see how Tribit stacks up against another one of my
top picks, Doss Soundbox, check out this [YouTube video
clip](https://youtu.be/1X1dMO9PH98).

### Conserve Battery Life with Moderate Volume but Beware the Charge

Tribit has a rechargeable battery. You get up to 24 hours of use if you are
conservative with the volume.

That makes this speaker great for travel and use when no outlet is available.
However, some units have failed to hold a charge.

So, make sure you test this while you are still in the warranty coverage
period.

### Lightweight Design for Ultimate Transportability

Its lightweight design at only 13 oz makes Tribit perfect for travel.

That trip through the airport carrying your speaker in your backpack or purse
is no problem at all.

### Waterproof, Easy Connect and Range: Well-Rounded for the Price

It has an IPX7 rating, so it’s perfect for your easy listening, bubble bath.

Aside from the great reviews on sound quality, this speaker also hit high
marks on connectivity.

It’s easy to connect Tribit to Bluetooth compatible devices. And the 66ft
range means you can wander a little and still hear the music.

### Tribit Xsound Go – What I Like

  * Incredible sound purity and clarity for a small speaker. 
  * Lightweight design is fantastic for traveling. 
  * Better than JBL Clip 3 for portability for sound quality. 
  * Its ease of connecting to Bluetooth compatible devices is fantastic. 

### Tribit Xsound Go – What I Don’t Like

  * It can have issues holding a charge. But if you contact Tribit within the 18-month replacement warranty period, they will replace the defective unit.
  * It doesn’t come with an Aux cable.
  * Giant logo Tribit plasters across the front cover. 

### Tribit Xsound – Go Who It’s Best For?

You love chilling to your favorite easy-listening songs while taking a bath.
Or relax in your comfy chair with a nice glass of wine.

You travel a lot, and you want something that is lightweight but makes you
feel like you’re at home when you listen to your music.

You’re on a tight budget, but you don’t want your Bluetooth speaker to sound
like you didn’t spend a lot of money on it.

For the price, this little speaker has a fantastic output.

Oontz Angle 3 is a small unit and weighs just over a ½ lb.

### Look Like a Tech Genius

The perfect Alexa companion, Echo Dot, connects all your Smart Home technology
in a snap. Impress your guests with your tech genius voice commands for under
$50.

Play songs from all your favorite streaming platforms with this smart little
Bluetooth speaker.

### A Great Little Conversation Piece

Its beautiful fabric covering looks fantastic, and it’s small enough to sit on
a shelf or in a corner. But, cool enough to be a conversation piece for those
invited party guests.

### The Ultimate Home Network Experience

It’s easy to connect multiple Echo Dot’s throughout your home for the ultimate
home network experience.

### Smart Speaker But Doesn’t Deliver High-Quality Sound

Amazon Echo Dot isn’t intended to produce high-quality stereo sound.

It works best as a smart device to connect your existing audio platforms and
intelligent home technology. But it sounds great for its intended use.

As far as Bluetooth speakers go, it wouldn’t have made my list except for the
fact that Smart technology is the latest rage.

And I wanted to offer my followers a variety of portable Bluetooth speaker
options under 50 dollars.

The Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) is the best smart speaker in this price range.

### Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) – What I Like

  * Limitless smart technology platforms to connect with this device.
  * Superb voice recognition technology.
  * Sleek and rounded design for a beautiful focal piece.
  * It’s a ton of fun to interact with your guests. 
  * A user-friendly smart speaker for the newbie.

### Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) – What I Don’t Like

  * It’s not battery operated. You have to buy a separate battery base.
  * The sound quality isn’t what I would expect for the price.

### Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) – Who It’s Best For?

If voice controlling your music and other audio is your thing, this Amazon
Echo Dot (3rd Gen) is perfect for you.

You love the latest gadgets, and entertaining your guests with your cool toys
is a fun pass time for you.

You have smart home technology and want everything automated so you can focus
on other important life tasks.

### Best Design with Cool Features, but Can Grandma Use It?

Not as good as the Tribit in sound quality but still an excellent speaker for
the price. The best part of Doss Soundbox is the easy-to-use touch controls.

Although the touch controls are a favorite feature for me, the volume control
